unnormalised: Local gurudwara, Shri Guru Singh Sabha, made headlines after a hilarious mix-up during their recent donation drive. It seems someone got a bit too enthusiastic with the decimal point.
normalised: Local gurudwara, Shri Guru Singh Sabha, made headlines after a hilarious mix-up during their recent donation drive. It seems someone got a bit too enthusiastic with the decimal point.

unnormalised: Instead of donating a respectable Rs. 500, one generous (or perhaps mathematically challenged) devotee accidentally transferred Rs. 50000.00 to the gurudwara’s account. That's 100 times more, folks!
normalised: Instead of donating a respectable rupee five hundred, one generous or perhaps mathematically challenged devotee accidentally transferred rupee fifty thousand point zero zero to the gurudwara’s account. That's one hundred times more, folks!

unnormalised: The gurudwara initially thought they’d received a miracle offering – maybe someone finally understood the power of compound interest. "We thought, 'Waheguru has truly blessed us!'" chuckled Sardar Gurpreet Singh, the gurudwara’s treasurer. "Then we checked the name and realised it was Sharma ji, who usually donates ₹500 max."
normalised: The gurudwara initially thought they’d received a miracle offering – maybe someone finally understood the power of compound interest. "We thought, 'Waheguru has truly blessed us!'" chuckled Sardar Gurpreet Singh, the gurudwara’s treasurer. "Then we checked the name and realised it was Sharma ji, who usually donates rupee five hundred max."

unnormalised: Of course, Sharma ji, upon discovering his "typo of titanic proportions," as he called it, was less than thrilled. Apparently, his monthly chai budget took a serious hit.
normalised: Of course, Sharma ji, upon discovering his "typo of titanic proportions," as he called it, was less than thrilled. Apparently, his monthly chai budget took a serious hit.

unnormalised: The Gurudwara committee, after a quick huddle (and a few samosas), decided to prepone their community outreach program by, oh, say, a year. Suddenly, they could afford that fancy new water cooler and maybe even a Bollywood movie night for the senior citizens.
normalised: The Gurudwara committee, after a quick huddle and a few samosas, decided to prepone their community outreach program by, oh, say, a year. Suddenly, they could afford that fancy new water cooler and maybe even a Bollywood movie night for the senior citizens.

unnormalised: "We called Sharma ji and explained that while we appreciated his accidental generosity, we’d be happy to return the extra Rs. 49500," Sardar Gurpreet Singh explained. "But, you know, we also hinted that a slightly larger donation next time wouldn't hurt."
normalised: "We called Sharma ji and explained that while we appreciated his accidental generosity, we’d be happy to return the extra rupee forty nine thousand five hundred," Sardar Gurpreet Singh explained. "But, you know, we also hinted that a slightly larger donation next time wouldn't hurt."

unnormalised: Sharma ji, relieved but slightly poorer, agreed to a slightly (and deliberately) larger donation next year. The moral of the story? Double-check those decimal points, folks, unless you’re secretly trying to fund the next big Bollywood blockbuster via charitable donations. And maybe, just maybe, Waheguru does have a sense of humour.
normalised: Sharma ji, relieved but slightly poorer, agreed to a slightly and deliberately larger donation next year. The moral of the story? Double-check those decimal points, folks, unless you’re secretly trying to fund the next big Bollywood blockbuster via charitable donations. And maybe, just maybe, Waheguru does have a sense of humour.
